thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-IQE's partner Cardiff University defends investment in company

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-IQE's partner Cardiff University defends investment in company
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Iqe Plc:
* ‍STATEMENT FROM CARDIFF JOINT VENTURE PARTNER​ * ‍IQE NOTES STATEMENT PROVIDED BY ITS CARDIFF JOINT VENTURE (“CSC”) PARTNER​
* ‍CARDIFF UNIVERSITY HAS INVESTED EQUITY OF £21.8M IN COMPOUND SEMICONDUCTOR CENTRE​
* ‍UNIVERSITY ENTERED INTO JOINT VENTURE AS A STRATEGIC INVESTMENT TO ENSURE OUR WORLD LEADING RESEARCH HAS A WELL-FOUNDED ROUTE TO COMMERCIALISATION​
* ‍SEVERAL PROJECT WINS HAVE BEEN ANNOUNCED WITHIN LAST YEAR​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting By London Bureau)
